name: Coinbase Research
title: Utf8qweeklythee2809cmostbeautifule2809dword
text:
Synopsis
Crypto and risk markets remain resilient despite trade tensions, with notable developments in Ethereum ETF flows and Uniswap V4 launch signaling potential shifts in crypto market dynamics.

Key Insights
- US-based spot ETH ETF inflows more than doubled BTC vehicle inflows ($409M vs $173M), suggesting potential divergence in sentiment between traditional and crypto-native investors
- CME ETH futures basis recently higher than BTC basis, traditionally viewed as a bullish positioning signal
- Perpetual futures funding rates indicate a more bearish outlook, with ETH funding rates turning negative
- Uniswap V4 launched, introducing programmable decentralized exchange (DEX) pool architecture with improved efficiency and native ETH support
- Ongoing trade tensions with China create market uncertainty, with unclear potential Federal Reserve response to potential price pressures
